article_title: My Turn: Child poverty an indictment of America
article_text:
Sunbury, PA (17801)

Today

Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 89F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds light and variable.

og.description: “Many things we need can wait. The child cannot. Now is the time his bones are being formed, his blood is being made, his mind is being developed. To him
